item.title: Recruitment video for GMU's Green Machine.
item.description: August 19th through 23rd I spent the week with JC Media and Doc Nix and The Green Machine filming their 2019 Band Camp. After the new student convocation (where they welcome the incoming freshman class) I started the process of editing the footage into the following recruitment video: Band Camp 2019: WelcomeToday is the first rehearsal of the semester and we're excited for some mid-week music making! Come check out our rehearsal in Dewberry Hall at 7:20pm, and donâ€™t forget your instrument!
